MovieCorner.mediator

Class MCAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • MovieCorner.mediator.MCAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MCPersistence

    public class MCAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MCPersistence
    Author:
    Mathias The adapter class handles all the communication with the database class, translating the clients actions into sql statements
